name: ttgvsca
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c2), cfv(cvsca, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cvsca, c2), cfv(cvsca, c1))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cvsca, c2), cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cvsca, cslot(nat6))
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wceq(cvsca, cslot(nat6))
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))

-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat6, cn)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))

body.origin:
|- wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat6))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wcel(nat1, cn)
-| wcel(nat6, cn0)
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))
-| wbr(nat6, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c1))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cvsca, c2))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cttg, c2))

comment: The scalar product of a subcomplex Hilbert space augmented with betweenness. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Mar-2019.)
